report.title: Moth Night occurrence list for export 3
report.description: A list of records filtered according to the ID of the user designed for exporting to MapMate. Includes a parameter for selecting survey and uses cache tables.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional onf ON onf.id = o.id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists ttl ON ttl.id = o.taxa_taxon_list_id LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values savSite ON savSite.sample_id = o.sample_id AND savSite.sample_attribute_id = 151 AND savSite.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN locations l ON l.location_type_id = 15 AND position('+' IN l.code) = 0 AND (ST_Contains(l.boundary_geom, ST_Centroid(o.public_geom))) AND l.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oavStg ON oavStg.occurrence_id = o.id AND oavStg.occurrence_attribute_id = 63 AND oavStg.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN list_termlists_terms lttStg ON lttStg.id = oavStg.int_value LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oavQty ON oavQty.occurrence_id = o.id AND oavQty.occurrence_attribute_id = 64 AND oavQty.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oavRec ON oavRec.occurrence_id = o.id AND oavRec.occurrence_attribute_id = 65 AND oavRec.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oavDet ON oavDet.occurrence_id = o.id AND oavDet.occurrence_attribute_id = 66 AND oavDet.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oavMtd ON oavMtd.occurrence_id = o.id AND oavMtd.occurrence_attribute_id = 67 AND oavMtd.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN list_termlists_terms lttMtd ON lttMtd.id = oavMtd.int_value #joins# WHERE #website_filter# AND o.survey_id = #survey_id# AND CAST(o.created_by_id AS character varying)='#user_id#' #order_by#
report.field_sql: ttl.preferred_taxon AS taxon, savSite.text_value AS site, onf.output_sref AS gridref, l.code as vc, oavRec.text_value AS recorder, oavDet.text_value AS determiner, to_char(o.date_start, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS date, oavQty.int_value AS quantity, lttMtd.term AS method, 'u' AS sex, lttStg.term AS stage, 'Not recorded' AS status, onf.comment

param.name: user_id
param.description: Something has gone wrong as you are logged in to the system but do not have an ID

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys
